about.title: Who I am
about.story: Born in Albuquerque, New Mexico, raised in Boise, Idaho, and now based in Madison, Wisconsin. I'm a 22-year-old artist, singer, songwriter, and producer with dual Swedish-American citizenship. I write, produce, and mix my own records — songs that feel authentic and introspective but still connect with people.
about.approach: My sound blends electronic elements with organic textures and honest lyrics. I'm drawn to creating atmospheric, immersive experiences that invite listeners into a world that's both personal and universal.
